[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@liquity/lib-base](./lib-base.md) &gt; [TransactableMoneyp](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.md) &gt; [adjustVault](./lib-base.transactablemoneyp.adjustvault.md)

## TransactableMoneyp.adjustVault() method

Adjust existing Vault by changing its collateral, debt, or both.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
adjustVault(params: VaultAdjustmentParams<Decimalish>, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<VaultAdjustmentDetails>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [VaultAdjustmentParams](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentparams.md)<!-- -->&lt;[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Parameters of the adjustment. |
|  maxBorrowingRate | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./lib-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) if <code>params</code> includes <code>borrowBPD</code>. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[VaultAdjustmentDetails](./lib-base.vaultadjustmentdetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Exceptions

Throws [TransactionFailedError](./lib-base.transactionfailederror.md) in case of transaction failure.

## Remarks

The transaction will fail if the Vault's debt would fall below [BPD\_MINIMUM\_DEBT](./lib-base.bpd_minimum_debt.md)<!-- -->.

If `maxBorrowingRate` is omitted, the current borrowing rate plus 0.5% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
